tournament.name: Fuguete Champ 270 - Play Point P/ Top 10

decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to control the game through the use of various spells and creatures, with a focus on recurring and reusing key cards with Ephemerate. The deck uses God-Pharaoh's Faithful and Sunscape Familiar to gain incremental advantages, while cards like Snap and Prohibit provide disruption. Mulldrifter and Archaeomancer provide card advantage and recursion, allowing the player to out-value their opponent. Meeting of Minds and LÃ³rien Revealed offer additional card draw and filtering. The deck aims to outlast opponents, gradually gaining advantage and overwhelming them with a superior late game.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on efficiently controlling the game through counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. It utilizes evasive creatures like Faerie Seer and Spellstutter Sprite to apply pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The deck also plays cards like Thorn of the Black Rose and Gurmag Angler for powerful late-game threats. By leveraging a mix of counterspells, removal, and card draw, this deck aims to outvalue the opponent and control the game until it can secure a win through its threats.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating value through sacrifice effects and card draw. By utilizing cards like Crypt Rats, Writhing Chrysalis, and Fanatical Offering, the deck aims to maintain board presence and keep the opponent's creatures in check. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Ichor Wellspring and Nihil Spellbomb helps with card advantage and graveyard disruption. This Golgari/Jund Garden deck seeks to outlast the opponent and grind out a win through incremental advantage.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent using low-cost creatures and burn spells. The goal is to apply constant pressure while burning the opponent's life total down, with cards like Lightning Bolt, Lava Dart, and Fiery Temper. Faithless Looting helps dig for more burn spells, while cards like Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery provide additional damage and resources. By aggressively attacking and burning the opponent, this deck aims to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. The deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Kitchen Imp to apply early pressure, while using burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper to efficiently remove threats. Faithless Looting and Grab the Prize provide card advantage and help maintain momentum. The deck also utilizes lifegain effects like Vampire's Kiss and Alms of the Vein to stabilize against aggressive opponents. Overall, the deck aims to quickly close out games through a combination of creature damage and direct burn.

The main concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper, the deck aims to quickly deplete the opponent's life total. The deck also includes cards like Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery to maintain card advantage and pressure the opponent. The mana base includes a mix of Mountains and Swamps, along with dual lands like Rakdos Carnarium to ensure consistent and efficient mana production.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, supported by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper. The deck also includes card draw and graveyard interaction with Faithless Looting and Alms of the Vein, while generating additional value with cards like Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery. The mana base includes a mix of Mountains, Swamps, and Rakdos dual lands to ensure consistent casting of spells.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle using low-cost creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker, Goblin Tomb Raider, and Voldaren Epicure. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast for direct damage to the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Rally at the Hornburg and Wrenn's Resolve helps to buff the creatures and keep up the pressure. By utilizing quick creatures and efficient spells, this deck aims to quickly defeat the opponent before they have a chance to establish their own board presence.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with cards like Saruli Caretaker, Masked Vandal, and Overgrown Battlement to potentially play Balustrade Spy early on. The key combo involves using Balustrade Spy's ability to mill your entire deck, putting Sagu Wildling and Lotleth Giant into your graveyard, and then using Dread Return to bring Lotleth Giant back to the battlefield for a massive amount of damage to your opponent. The deck also includes cards like Generous Ent and Winding Way to draw through your deck and find the combo pieces efficiently.

The main concept of this deck is to flood the board with a large number of Elves in order to overwhelm the opponent quickly. By utilizing mana dorks like Fyndhorn Elves, Llanowar Elves, and Elvish Mystic, the deck can ramp up its mana production early on. Cards like Timberwatch Elf and Generous Ent provide powerful buffs for the Elves, while Wellwisher helps to maintain the player's life total. Lead the Stampede and Winding Way help to refill the player's hand with more creatures, ensuring a constant stream of threats for the opponent to deal with.

This Aggro - Affinity Pauper deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and efficient removal spells. By maximizing the benefits of affinity for artifacts, the deck can deploy threats at a rapid pace while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Krark-Clan Shaman and Nihil Spellbomb. With a mix of aggressive creatures, efficient removal, and card draw, the deck aims to maintain a high tempo and pressure the opponent into submission. The key concept revolves around leveraging artifacts to create a dominating board presence and control the pace of the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent through a combination of creature aggro and burn spells. By using low-cost creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, along with direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Fireblast, the goal is to pressure the opponent's life total early on. Cards like Faithless Looting and Grab the Prize help draw into more burn spells and maintain card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to win the game swiftly through aggressive creature attacks and direct damage spells.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using cheap, efficient creatures and burn spells. With cards like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker providing early pressure, supported by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Faithless Looting and Grab the Prize helps to keep the aggression going and maintain card advantage, while Fireblast provides a potential finisher for the final blows.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with low-cost creatures that gain life or provide value when they enter the battlefield. By gaining incremental life and controlling the board with removal spells like Journey to Nowhere, the deck aims to outlast opponents while putting pressure on them with efficient attackers. The deck also includes some recursion and card advantage engines to maintain consistency and grind out wins in longer games. With a mix of lifegain, aggression, and resilience, Orzhov Aggro aims to overwhelm opponents with a relentless assault.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes cheap creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, along with efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper to maintain board control. Faithless Looting and Grab the Prize help dig for more threats, while Alms of the Vein provides incremental life gain to stay in the game. The deck also includes some additional burn spells and a few utility lands to support the aggressive game plan and outpace the opponent.

The main idea of this deck is to control the board using Urzatron lands and creatures, while generating extra mana and card advantage through cards like Expedition Map and Prophetic Prism. Myr Scrapling, Evolution Witness, and Foundry Inspector are used to maintain board presence, while cards like Pactdoll Terror and Malevolent Rumble serve as removal spells. Candy Trail and Weather the Storm provide additional support, while Energy Refractor and Conduit Pylons help ramp up mana production. Overall, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through efficient control and resource management.
